plot: To help his cousin make a deal with a rich German businessman, who also is a lady-killer, a man hires a hooker to play the part of his cousin's wife. But the real wife appears, and something hits the fan...
title: O Diabo na Cama
plot_es: To help his cousin make a deal with a rich German businessman, who also is a lady-killer, a man hires a hooker to play the part of his cousin's wife. But the real wife appears, and something hits the fan...
plot_en: To help his cousin make a deal with a rich German businessman, who also is a lady-killer, a man hires a hooker to play the part of his cousin's wife. But the real wife appears, and something hits the fan...
